'''''The Tenth Muse''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category [[Wonders of the World]]. To complete the achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|The Shadow Over Petrichor}}.

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is likely a reference to the {{w|Muses|Nine Muses}} of Greek mythology.
